file.name: SystemsAdministration.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Systems Administration
  description: Administer the configuration, maintenance, assignment and track usage and status of all IT assets deployed in development and production across the enterprise
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/SystemsAdministration/10.0.0
paths:
  /SystemsAdministration/{systemsadministrationId}/Capture:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - ITSystemAdministrativePlan
      summary: CaCR Capture IT System Administrative Plan activity or event related information
      description: CaCR Capture IT System Administrative Plan activity or event related information
      operationId: Capture
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/SystemsAdministrationID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CaptureITSystemAdministrativePlanRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CaptureITSystemAdministrativePlanResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /SystemsAdministration/{systemsadministrationId}/Control:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - ITSystemAdministrativePlan
      summary: CoCR Control the processing of IT System Administrative Plan
      description: CoCR Control the processing of IT System Administrative Plan
      operationId: Control
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/SystemsAdministrationID'

          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:

        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /SystemsAdministration/{systemsadministrationId}/Exchange:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - ITSystemAdministrativePlan
      summary: EcCR Accept, verify, etc. aspects of IT System Administrative Plan processing
      description: EcCR Accept, verify, etc. aspects of IT System Administrative Plan processing

      parameters:

  /SystemsAdministration/{systemsadministrationId}/Grant:

      tags:
      - CR - ITSystemAdministrativePlan
      summary: GrCR Obtain permission to act in relation to IT System Administrative Plan
      description: GrCR Obtain permission to act in relation to IT System Administrative Plan
      operationId: Grant
      parameters:

components:
  schemas:
    ITSystemAdministrativePlan:
      type: object
      properties:
        ITSystemAdministrativePlanBudgetType:
          type: string
        ITSystemAdministrativePlanBudget:
          type: string
        ITSystemAdministrativePlanAssignment:
          type: string
        ITSystemAdministrativePlanPlan:
          type: string
        ITSystemAdministrativePlanReference:
          type: object
    Configuration:
      type: object
      properties:
        ConfigurationPreconditions:
          type: string
        ConfigurationBusinessUnit/EmployeeReference:
          type: object
        ConfigurationWorkSchedule:
          type: string
